description:
A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from D4DJ Groovy Mix! This pack also includes Taito game arrangement songs and J-POP cover songs by D4DJ characters!

This pack includes the following content.
■Songs Pack (10 songs)
・LOVE!HUG!GROOVY!!  / Happy Around!＆Peaky P-key
・Guru Guru DJ TURN!! / Happy Around! feat. KYOKO & SAKI
・Electric Chaos★Countdown / Peaky P-key
・Photon Melodies / Photon Maiden
・Balalaika / Happy Around!
・Feeling Good ↑↑ / Happy Around!
・CAPTAIN NEO～BOSS SCENE1(D4DJ MIX) / Arranged by MASAKI(ZUNTATA)
・CHAOS～BOSS SCENE7(D4DJ MIX) / Arranged by MASAKI(ZUNTATA)
・URBAN TRAIL(D4DJ MIX) / Arranged by Shohei Tsuchiya(ZUNTATA)
・???(Secret)

■Navigators
・Rinku Aimoto *with voice
・Kyoko Yamate *with voice

■Avatars
・Rinku Aimoto(2D)
・Kyoko Yamate(2D)
・Inter Gray Xsi(3D)
・Legend Silver Hawk Burst(3D)
・Next Silver Hawk Burst(3D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.
name: D4DJ Groovy Mix+Game Song Pack
